title: App standby states are all active
content:
The meaning of using Hangul translation may be different. I'm using Pixel 2 Xl, but I do not have an option and I've written it elsewhere.
Maybe it happened after the May update. All of my apps' app standby status is fixed to active and has not been modified when entering safe mode. I reset app settings because they have files that are not backed up, but they do not work. Heat and battery consumption have increased significantly.
